mdx.excerpt: AdoptOpenJDK is happy to announce the immediate availability of AdoptOpenJDK 8u275 and 11.0.9.1. The OpenJDK project identified regressions in OpenJDK 8u272 andâ€¦

frontmatter.title: AdoptOpenJDK 8u275 and 11.0.9.1 Available
frontmatter.author: andreasahlenstorf
frontmatter.description: AdoptOpenJDK is happy to announce the immediate availability of AdoptOpenJDK 8u275 and 11.0.9.1. As always, all binaries are thoroughly tested and available free of charge without usage restrictions on a wide range of platforms.
